item.title: Playing around with ChatGPT
item.description: So, like so many (here and here as nice and simple examplesâ€”heck, even Graham Harman has gotten into the discussion here) in the computer science field, I have been playing around with the newly-released “ChatGPT” chatbot released through openAI. It’s also that time of the year when we academics start turning to getting all of those syllabi for the upcoming Spring semester ready to go. We all now how onerous it can be to create, say, a reading schedule with dates that we always need to shift when we move from one semester to another.
